summary: This document is an email or memo listing administrative records and documentation related to the detention and death of Jeffrey Epstein at the Metropolitan Correctional Center in New York. It includes references to detention orders, property records, medical and psychological logs, suicide watch documentation, and staff memos, indicating a post-mortem administrative review.

persons.name: Jeffrey Edward Epstein
persons.context: The primary subject of the document, listed with his prison registration number and status as deceased. The document catalogs extensive administrative, medical, and psychological records related to his detention.

persons.name: Efrain Reyes
persons.context: Listed as Epstein's cellmate with his own registration number. Documentation related to him is included in the file list.

persons.name: K. Schlessinger
persons.context: Referenced in a staff memo listed among the documentation. Likely involved in the psychological assessment or observation of Epstein.

persons.name: N. Bullock
persons.context: Listed in staff memos among the documentation, indicating administrative or operational staff involvement.

persons.name: G. Adams
persons.context: Listed in staff memos among the documentation, indicating correctional staff involvement.

connections.description: Reyes is explicitly listed as Epstein's cellmate in the documentation catalog.
As Acting Chief Psychologist, Schlessinger's memos are part of the documentation, indicating professional oversight of Epstein's psychological state.

events.title: Administrative Detention Order for Epstein
events.description: An Administrative Detention (AD) order was issued for Jeffrey Epstein, a form of restrictive housing.

events.title: Suicide Watch Logging Begins
events.description: Suicide Watch Chronological logs were maintained for Epstein on July 23 & 24, 2019.

events.title: Extended Psychology Observation Period
events.description: Psychology Observation log books were maintained for Epstein from July 8-10 and July 24-30, 2019.

events.title: Court Documentation and Staff Logs
events.description: Court documentation regarding a WAB (possibly Writ of Habeas Corpus or similar) and a Lieutenant's log were dated August 9, 2019, the day before this document was sent.

events.title: Document Compilation Email Sent
events.description: This email or memo listing all documentation related to Epstein's detention and death was sent.

locations: SHU (Special Housing Unit at MCC New York)
keyFacts: The document catalogs a comprehensive set of administrative, medical, and psychological records related to Jeffrey Epstein's detention and death at MCC New York.
Epstein was placed under an Administrative Detention order on July 29, 2019, and was on suicide watch with logs from July 23-24, 2019.
Epstein's cellmate was identified as inmate Efrain Reyes (Reg. No. 85993-054), and documentation for both inmates is included.
The document references specific staff involved, including Acting Chief Psychologist Dr. K. Schlessinger, IDO N. Bullock, and CO G. Adams.
The document was sent on August 10, 2019, the day after Epstein's death, indicating it is part of an immediate post-mortem administrative review.
